text: [Ej ashoʙi pajomʙar] Afrode az sumo, ki dar ruzi ʙarxurdi du guruh [musulmonon va kofiron dar cangi Uhud] firor kardand, dar haqiqat sajton ononro ʙa saʙaʙi ʙa'ze az kirdor [va gunohon]-e, ki murtakiʙ suda ʙudand, ʙa inhirof kasond va, hatman, Alloh taolo az onon darguzast. Be gumon, Alloh taolo omurzandai ʙurdʙor ast
